titleInfo.title: Pol Ext 8327/49 'D.G. BRUGGER: COMPLAINT OF NON-RECEIPT OF POSTAGE STAMPS FROM KUWAIT.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 15; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence between D A Bruggers, the Postal Services Department, and the Commonwealth Relations Office, regarding the complaints by Bruggers that sent goods failed delivery to Kuwait. The subsequent correspondence details the change in offices after Indian independence related to the postal confusion.
